          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical reaction between magnesium and water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Reaktion zwischen Magnesium und Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction chimique entre le magnésium et l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação química entre o magnésio e a água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione chimica fra magnesio ed acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική αντίδραση μεταξύ του μαγνήσιου και του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción química entre el magnesio y el agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations that show magnesium reacting with steam. This illustration shows the word equation for the reaction. The other illustration shows the experimental set-up.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die das 
Magnesium zeigen, das mit Dampf reagiert. Diese Abbildung zeigt 
die Wortgleichung für die Reaktion. Die andere Abbildung zeigt 
die experimentelle Installation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations qui montrent
le magnésium réagissant avec la vapeur. Cette illustration 
montre l'équation de mot pour la réaction. L'autre 
illustration montre l'installation expérimentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram o 
magnésio que reage com o vapor. Esta ilustração mostra a 
equação da palavra para a reação. A outra ilustração 
mostra a instalação experimental.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
mostrano il magnesio che reagisce con il vapore. Questa 
illustrazione mostra l'equazione di parola per la reazione. 
L'altra illustrazione mostra la messa a punto sperimentale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μαγνήσιο που 
αντιδρά με τον ατμό. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει εξίσωση 
λέξης για την αντίδραση. Η άλλη απεικόνιση εμφανίζει 
πειραματική οργάνωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran el magnesio que reacciona con vapor. Esta ilustración 
muestra la ecuación de la palabra para la reacción. La otra 
ilustración muestra la disposición experimental.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnesiumoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
